prop.name: showTabs
prop.description: Show tab buttons on top of slider.

prop.name: showNavs
prop.description: Show navigation buttons on bottom of slider.

prop.name: showButtons
prop.description: Show next/prev buttons on next to slider.

prop.name: slidesPerPage (added from 2.4.0)
prop.description: Number of visible slides per view.

prop.name: interval
prop.description: Miliseconds time to automatic change the value key. If it's 0, it does not apply.

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value.

scopedSlot.name: tab
scopedSlot.description: Field tab buttons template. slide param equal to slot (slide) names.
